CHAT.comment: CITIZENS UNITED, Petitioner v. FEDERAL ELECTION COMMISSION.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:09 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MALCOLM L. STEWART ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF THEODORE B. OLSON ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon, at 11:11 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
